Authors: Meiryani, Sun Y., Isa S.M., Candra V.L.
Title: The effect of system user support on accounting information systems
Affiliations: Accounting Department, Faculty of Economics and Communication, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Meiryani, Accounting Department, Faculty of Economics and Communication, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Sun, Y., Accounting Department, Faculty of Economics and Communication, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Isa, S.M., Accounting Department, Faculty of Economics and Communication, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Candra, V.L., Accounting Department, Faculty of Economics and Communication, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: Accounting information systems can improve decision making by providing timely information. Accounting information systems within the company contribute such as providing accurate and timely information so that the company can carry out operational activities effectively and efficiently and improve quality and reduce the cost of products and services produced. This study aims to determine the influence of system user support in Development Information System on Accounting Information System performance. This research uses quantitative methods using primary data in the form of questionnaires. The analytical method used in this study is multiple linear regression with Rstudio software. The results showed thatn System user support in the Development of Information Systems affecting the Performance of Information Systems. © 2020 EManuscript Technologies. All rights reserved.
Author Keywords: Accounting Information Systems; Development; Formalization; Information System; Performance; System user support; System User Support; User Involvement
Index Keywords: analytic method; article; human; human experiment; information system; quantitative analysis; questionnaire; software
